entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Belleville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:39 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, 2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 6:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: 2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: -1.1°C
Wind: WSW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning late in the morning. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and early afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 6:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
